metadata.name: Remote Access Tool - ScreenConnect Installation Execution
metadata.comment: Detects ScreenConnect program starts that establish a remote access to a system.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('e=access&')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('y=guest&')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&p=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&c=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&k=')))

output.summary: Detects ScreenConnect program starts that establish a remote access to a system.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use by administrative staff Reference: https://www.anomali.com/blog/probable-iranian-cyber-actors-static-kitten-conducting-cyberespionage-campaign-targeting-uae-and-kuwait-government-agencies
